description:
Every once in a while, I like to get five or six hot guys in a room and let them fuck the shit out of each other — and I certainly couldn't send Alexander back to England without giving his ass one last pounding.
Along with Alexander, this installment of the "Fuckfest" series brings together Wade, Foster, Adam, and Colby. The guys really hit it off and had a great time with each other. At the end, I asked Foster if he would be willing to let the guys cum all over him and the response I got was a big smile. In fact, he liked it so much that he shot two big loads all over the place!
title: Fuckfest 4
